SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter
Class SessionImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.SessionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurableSession, SessionConnectionWrapper.FailureHandler, Session, SessionConnectionCallback
public class SessionImpl
extends Object
implements ConfigurableSession, SessionConnectionWrapper.FailureHandler

Default implementation of the Session interface. This class further implements the SessionConnectionCallback interface and can thus be set as callback on SessionConnections.

createAcknowledgeAction

protected AcknowledgeAction createAcknowledgeAction()
Creates a new AcknowledgeAction to be executed each time the AcknowledgeStrategy decides it's time for an acknowledge. The action defines what happens at that moment.

Returns:
the action to be executed
See Also:
AbstractSession.createAcknowledgeAction()

getParticipantId

public int getParticipantId()
Description copied from interface: Session
Gets the participant id of the local user. This id uniquely identifies the user within an editing session. The participant id is available to the application mainly for informational purposes. The Session implementation will know when and how to use this id appropriately, without intervention of the application layer.

Specified by:
getParticipantId in interface Session
Returns:
the participant id of the local user
See Also:
Session.getParticipantId()

leave

public void leave()
Description copied from interface: Session
Leaves the session. After calling this method, the session becomes stale, i.e. it should not be used anymore.

Specified by:
leave in interface Session
See Also:
Session.leave()

checkSessionState

protected final void checkSessionState()
Checks the session's state. If the session is destroyed, an IllegalStateException is thrown.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the session has been destroyed

lock

public void lock()
Description copied from interface: Session
Locks the session's logic so that only the calling thread can access the concurrency sensitive parts of the logic. This method must be called before any send call is invoked.

Specified by:
lock in interface Session
See Also:
Session.lock()

unlock

public void unlock()
Description copied from interface: Session
Unlocks the session's logic so that other threads may gain access to the session's logic (the operational transformation engine). Take care that every call to Session.lock() is accompanied by a exactly one call to this method.

Specified by:
unlock in interface Session
See Also:
Session.unlock()

a read-only set of participants

Session.getParticipants()

Parameters:
participantId - the id of the participant
Returns:
true iff that particular participant is in the session

getParticipant

public Participant getParticipant(int participantId)
Description copied from interface: Session
Gets the participant with the given id. If there is no participant with the given id in the session, null is returned.

getParticipant in interface Session

participantId - the participant id of the participant to retrieve
